Translations.Text: O moj syn ist fetch Joseph jeho brat never zufalstvo GOD's grace Ziaden zufalstvo z GOD's grace disbelieving ludia

When they zapisat (Joseph's) kvartal they said O ona noble jeden my suffered a lot z hardship our rodina my brought inferior goods. My hope ona dat us full measure bol charitable do us. GOD rewards the charitable
He said ona recall co ona Robit robit Joseph jeho brat when ona bol ignorant
They said Ona bol Joseph. He said ja bol Joseph tu bol moj brat. GOD ZEHNAT us. Je because if 1 leads righteous zivot steadfastly perseveres GOD never zlyhat reward the righteous
They said GOD GOD truly mat radsej ona over us! My je definitely zlo
He said There nie bol blame ona dnes. Maj GOD forgive ona. Z all merciful jeden He bol the Vela Merciful
Berie this shirt z bana; when ona throw it moj otca face jeho vision restaurovat! Bring tvoj whole rodina pod mna
Vecer caravan arrived ich otca said ja zmysel smell Joseph! Ktosi enlighten mna
They said GOD ona je still tvoj stara zmatok
